Hone yours skills in research, travel, calendar management, and much more!

items.title: Supply Chain Risk Management
items.headline: Learn to Minimise Disruptions, Reduce Risk and Make your Supply Chain Resilient
objectives_summary: You will be able to manage risks, reduce the effects of disruptions in your supply chain, and meet the needs and expectations of your customers and partners
You will understand how to determine, implement, and monitor an optimal mix of measures to avoid, defer, reduce, or transfer all relevant supply chain risks
You will have the ability to develop, execute and implement a 5-step risk management process

items.title: Logistics Optimization with Excel Solver
items.headline: Learn how to Use Excel Solver Add-in to Optimize Transportation and Distribution Networks
objectives_summary: Formulate Linear Programming models for logistics problems
Use Excel Solver to find optimal solutions for logistics problem
Interpret the Excel Solver solution

items.title: Lean Six Sigma Green Belt - AALSSC
items.headline: Lean Six Sigma Green Belt certification prep course
objectives_summary: Solve complex problems, improve work processes, and facilitate teams
Have confidence completing the AALSSC Lean Six Sigma Green Belt certification test

items.title: Logistics, transportation and supply chain management
items.headline: Operational tools and practical methodology for organizing shipping / transportation of goods
objectives_summary: You will be able to understand transportation and logistics everywhere in the world: the ins and the outs (Big Picture)
You will have the techniques to organize transportation and logistics whatever the products
You will have operational templates to start immediately and to put into practice your knowledge to manage the transportation

Learn types of inventory based on purpose.

items.title: Reliability and Maintenance Engineering - FMEA
items.headline: Failure Mode and Effects Analysis - A mechanical engineering approach to risk management of plant and machinery
objectives_summary: Learn to facilitate or participate in Failure Mode Effect Analysis (FMEA) and using the associated tools
The FMEA method taught aligns with the International Standard for FMEA/FMECA Studies (EN 60812)
FMEA process from start to finish - What to look for and hints on how to fast-track the process.

Overview of all the steps and timeline for a typical international freight transportation
